title: How to Kill a Hound of Asthmaria

steps.headline: Bribe Sgnihcti Dracir the bandit lord of the Ecalp Krikles mountain range (the 51st Hilltop) for the combination for Relani's tomb.
Once inside, kill the zombie accountants guarding the doorway and follow these directions through the Labyrinth of Sonim: Left, Right, Left, Left, Down, Right, Left, Inwards, Right and Backwards.
You will come to the sarcophagus of Relani Nilotev, the trollic patron saint of relief.
steps.description: Open her lungs to find the Battleskewer of Feyler.

steps.headline: Now sap your thetanati levels (the spell Mot's Esiurcation should do the trick) and equip the battleskewer.
steps.description: Your thetanati levels will take a real boost so sleep it off (should take about a day).

steps.headline: Open the trap door behind the sarcophagus.
steps.description: It will lead to the entrance of the tomb, where you will find your zombie accountant friends have reanimated as zombie buskers, but the latest edition to your weapons inventory will make short work of them!

steps.headline: Now you can feel free to plunder the dungeons of Megopolis without worrying about your thetanati levels: the hounds of Asthmaria are finally vulnerable to your attacks.

text: Bribe Sgnihcti Dracir the bandit lord of the Ecalp Krikles mountain range (the 51st Hilltop) for the combination for Relani's tomb.  Imp-surf there and enter.  Once inside, kill the zombie accountants guarding the doorway and follow these directions through the Labyrinth of Sonim: Left, Right, Left, Left, Down, Right, Left, Inwards, Right and Backwards.  You will come to the sarcophagus of Relani Nilotev, the trollic patron saint of relief. Open her lungs to find the Battleskewer of Feyler. Now sap your thetanati levels (the spell Mot's Esiurcation should do the trick) and equip the battleskewer. Your thetanati levels will take a real boost so sleep it off (should take about a day). Open the trap door behind the sarcophagus. It will lead to the entrance of the tomb, where you will find your zombie accountant friends have reanimated as zombie buskers, but the latest edition to your weapons inventory will make short work of them! Now you can feel free to plunder the dungeons of Megopolis without worrying about your thetanati levels: the hounds of Asthmaria are finally vulnerable to your attacks. Happy gaming!
